Token.Abstract: Block control event handling for UIControl.
Adds a block for a particular event to an internal dispatch table.

Parameter.Name: handler
Parameter.Abstract: A block representing an action message, with an argument for the sender.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the action message is sent.

Token.Abstract: Removes all control event blocks associated with the given mask of control events.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the block will be removed.

Token.Abstract: Checks to see if the control has any blocks for a particular event combination.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which to check for blocks.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns YES if there are blocks for these control events, NO otherwise.
